author: perezhilton
title: Britney Spears Asks For Fans' Prayers Following Her Niece Maddie's ATV Accident
text:
Our hearts and prayers continue to go out to little Maddie .
As you know, on Sunday it was reported that Jamie Lynn Spears ' daughter was in critical condition after an ATV accident on her family's property â€” right in front of Spears and her husband Jamie Watson .
According to the police report, the 25-year-old dove in and tried to rescue the girl , but was unable to free her from her safety belt and the ATV netting. Maddie is currently in critical but stable condition at a New Orleans hospital.
Every parent's nightmare!
Related: Britney Doesn't Care About Her Onstage Nip Slip! 
Speaking out on social media on Monday, Maddie's aunt Britney Spears asked fans for "wishes and prayers" for her niece's recovery: 
Need all the wishes and prayers for my niece ðŸ’œ pic.twitter.com/lTlVQmNEh5 
â€” Britney Spears (@britneyspears) February 6, 2017 
You got it!!
We'll keep you updated as we learn more about Maddie's condition.
[ Image via Instagram /Judy Eddy/ WENN . ]
